paper_abstract: This paper is to study the rough sets within the context of lattices. We study the special properties of the rough sets which can be constructed by means of the congruences determined by ideals of lattice. Also the properties of the generalized rough sets with respect to ideals of lattice are investigated. Finally we give an example of their application in formal concept analysis. (C) 2014 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Rough sets induced by ideals in lattices
